attributes.action: repeal the ban on incandescent light bulbs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We cannot understand why the prime minister has gone against public opinion and decided to ban the incandescent light bulb.
The prime minister was elected to protect the interests of the British people and to protect the freedom of our country and or right to choice, but he seems to have lost his way and has decided to ban incandescent light bulbs and has replaced them with inferior energy saving ones to help combat global warming even although most of the British people are against this ban, we ask him to bring back the incandescent light bulb and let people CHOOSE whether they want to use energy saving ones or incandescent ones.
